OOC: That was pretty good, and I like long posts. But let me ask you, is
there something wrong with your face?

BIC:
Beachcomber arrived on the edge of the valley. He quickly transformed,
and turned around. He put his hands out, and a beam emmitted into the
ground. Waves began to spray across his shadelike eyes. "Hmmmmmmmm. The
valley is very dry, lined with igneous rocks, but there is a strange
energy, that seems out of place." He said, contemplatevly. He began to
walk forwards, towards Redhot.
